dcterms:creator: Loic Matthey
Irina Higgins
Demis Hassabis
Alexander Lerchner
dcterms:description: The dSprites dataset is composed of images of squares, ellipses, and hearts. Each image contains one shape with its own scale, orientation, and (X, Y) position. The dataset is used to analyze the latent representation learned by variational auto-encoders.
dcterms:title: dSprites Dataset
